hybridauth_merge_confirmation: Account with such email already registered, check your email, after confirmation we'll attach this account to your main account.
hybridauth_merge_confirmation_mail_body:
Hello, %1$s!

You are registered on the site %2$s. Someone tries enter our site with %2$s, by specifying this email.

If it was you - follow the link %4$s so that we can unite your %3$s account with the main account on site, otherwise ignore the letter, and after %4$s unconfirmed %3$s account on the server will be automatically deleted, and your account will remain untouched.

Do not reply to this letter, it was sent automatically and does not require an answer.
hybridauth_merge_mail_sended: This email is already registered in the system, we sent a letter for confirming of merging local account with %s account
hybridauth_merging_confirmed_successfull: Merging of local account site account with %s account was successful!
hybridauth_merge_confirm_code_invalid: Merging of accounts failed, invalid confirmation code
enable_contacts_detection_info: This option enables functionality of getting list of contacts/friends from integrated providers
